title: Tensei shitara Party ga Otokonoko darake Datta kedo Danjite Ore wa Shotacon ja Nai!
original_name: 転生したらパーティが男の子だらけだったけど断じて俺はショタコンじゃない!
sinopse:
One day, high school student Kakeru had met the end of his life in a traffic accident. But he noticed he was reincarnated into a fantasy world. Moreover, it was a village full of shota without women and adults!

(Source: Kill Time Communication, translated)
